Package net.minecraft.core

Enum Class Direction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<net.minecraft.core.Direction>
net.minecraft.core.Direction
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.util.StringRepresentable
public enum Direction extends Enum<Direction> implements net.minecraft.util.StringRepresentable
Represents any direction in 3D space.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum
    Plane
    Represents a plane in 3D space.
    static enum
    AxisDirection
    Represents a direction of an Direction.Axis in 3D Space.
    static enum
    Axis
    Represents an Axis in 3D Space.

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    DOWN
    The negative y direction.
    EAST
    The positive x direction.
    NORTH
    The negative z direction.
    SOUTH
    The positive z direction.
    UP
    The positive y direction.
    WEST
    The negative x direction.

      private final int data3d
      The 3D data value of this Direction.
      This is identical to the enum's ordinal.

    • oppositeIndex

      private final int oppositeIndex
      The index (ordinal) of the opposite Direction.

    • data2d

      private final int data2d
      The 2D data value of this Direction.
      This will be -1 for 3D directions, which include Direction#UP and Direction#DOWN.

    • name

      private final String name
      The name of this Direction.

    • axis

      private final Direction.Axis axis
      The axis of this Direction.

    • axisDirection

      private final Direction.AxisDirection axisDirection
      The direction of the axis for this Direction.

    • normal

      private final Vec3i normal
      The normal block position for this Direction.
      This is represented with its direction being 1 or -1 depending on the axis, and all other coordinates set to 0.

    • VALUES

      private static final Direction[] VALUES
      An array containing all the Direction values.

      Creates a new Direction.
      Parameters:
      data3d - The 3D data value of this Direction.
      oppositeIndex - The index (ordinal) of the opposite Direction.
      data2d - The 2D data value of this Direction.
      name - The name of this Direction.
      axis - The axis of this Direction.
      axisDirection - The direction of the axis for this Direction.
      normal - The normal block position for this Direction.
